settings.name: CarPayList
settings.select: a.[SaleOrderCode],a.[SaleDate],a.[CustomerID],u.userName SaleMan, a.[VIN],c.BrandName,c.SeriesName,c.ModelName,a.IsInstalment,a.BankID, a.CustomerFistPay,a.BankPay,c.[OutsideColor],a.[FeeTotal],a.[Remark],a.[IsOld], a.[IsPay],a.[IsOut],a.Subscription, ISNULL(f.SumPaid,0) SumPaid,(FeeTotal-ISNULL(f.SumPaid,0)) as Debt, g.TypeName,b.CustomerCode,b.CustomerName,b.MobileTel
settings.from: A_SaleOrders as a inner join B_AutoArchives c on a.vin = c.vin left join B_Customer as b on a.CustomerID=b.CustomerID left join B_CustomerType as g on b.TypeID=g.TypeID left join sys_user u on a.saleMan = u.userCode left join ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(PayMoney),0) AS SumPaid, VIN,CorpID FROM A_PaymentDetail WHERE PaymentType='整车付款' GROUP BY VIN,CorpID) f on a.VIN = f.VIN AND a.CorpID=f.CorpID

settings.name: carPaidItems
settings.from: A_SaleOrders as a inner join A_PaymentDetail c on c.VIN = a.VIN left join B_Customer as b on a.CustomerID=b.CustomerID and a.CorpID=c.CorpID

settings.name: partsPayList
settings.select: a.SellOrderCode, a.SellTime, u.userName Seller, a.TotalAmount, a.Remark, ISNULL(f.SumPaid, 0) SumPaid, (a.TotalAmount - ISNULL(f.SumPaid, 0)) AS Debt, g.TypeName, b.CustomerID, b.CustomerCode, b.CustomerName, b.MobileTel
settings.from: P_SellOrderHead AS a LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS b ON a.CustomerID = b.CustomerID LEFT JOIN B_CustomerType AS g ON b.TypeID = g.TypeID LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.Seller = u.UserCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(PayMoney), 0) AS SumPaid,OriBillCode,CorpID FROM A_PaymentDetail WHERE PaymentType = '备件付款' GROUP BY OriBillCode,CorpID ) f ON a.SellOrderCode = f.OriBillCode AND a.CorpID=f.CorpID

settings.name: partsPaidItems
settings.from: P_SellOrderHead as a inner join A_PaymentDetail c on a.SellOrderCode = c.OriBillCode left join B_Customer as b on a.CustomerID=b.CustomerID and a.CorpID=c.CorpID

settings.name: RepairPayList
settings.select: a.DispatchID, a.DispatchCode, a.SignCode, a.VIN, a.MeetAutoTime, u.UserName EmpName, a.EarningSum, a.Remark, ISNULL(f.SumPaid, 0) SumPaid, (a.EarningSum - ISNULL(f.SumPaid, 0)) AS Debt, g.TypeName, b.CustomerID, b.CustomerCode, b.CustomerName, b.MobileTel
settings.from: S_Balance AS a LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS b ON a.CustomerID = b.CustomerID LEFT JOIN B_CustomerType AS g ON b.TypeID = g.TypeID LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.EmpName = u.UserCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(PayMoney), 0) AS SumPaid, OriBillCode,CorpID FROM A_PaymentDetail WHERE PaymentType = '维修付款' GROUP BY OriBillCode,CorpID ) f ON a.DispatchCode = f.OriBillCode and a.CorpID=f.CorpID

settings.name: RepairPaidItems
settings.from: S_Balance as a inner join A_PaymentDetail c on a.DispatchCode = c.OriBillCode left join B_Customer as b on a.CustomerID=b.CustomerID and a.CorpID=c.CorpID
